definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: II. [[שׁאר]] (√ of foll.; cf. As. šêru, Pun. [[שאר]], flesh, Ar.3a0’run blood-revenge, so Sab. [[תַאר]], Sab. Denkm:No. 5, 1. 7; perhaps orig. blood (cf. Je 51:35), Nö:ZMG xi (1886), 723 and Id:M 101, who cp. Mand. [[תירתא]] = tiyrto0 conscience, mind, etc., perh. prop. midriff, cf. Hoffm:infr.).
